snippet: Laura Yecies of SugarSync, an online storage service, says performance evaluations need to offer positive feedback for employees.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with online storage service SugarSync chief executive Laura Yecies discussing her management style.
lead_paragraph: Laura Yecies of SugarSync, an online storage service, says performance evaluations need to offer positive feedback for employees.

headline.print_headline: When You Write A Report Card, Explain the Grade
headline.seo: Laura Yecies of SugarSync, on Thoughtful Evaluations
headline.main: When You Write a Report Card, Explain the Grades
